participant_1.name: Kazuki Tanaka
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Kazuki values learning and has a deep connection to his family.
participant_1.background: My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains. I came from Japan to teach high school over 10 years ago. I miss my father every day. I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life. I am one of four siblings.

participant_2.name: Sophia Miller
participant_2.personality: Creative and compassionate, Sophia expresses her emotions through her work and has a strong desire for acceptance.
participant_2.background: I remember the smell of my mom's cooking and the sound of my dad's laughter. I started my own yoga studio to share my love of the practice with others. I spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign films on Netflix. I am a woman who worries about the judgment of my family because of my sexual orientation. I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do in your spare time?
I love to watch obscure foreign films on Netflix!
That's cool! I love to learn about skiing and the mountains. I'm from Japan and I came to the US to teach high school over 10 years ago.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to go to Japan. I went to Rome once and ate a lot of delicious pasta.
That sounds amazing! I've never been to Rome. I miss my father every day. He passed away a few years ago.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I remember the smell of my mom's cooking and the sound of my dad's laughter.
Thank you. I miss both of my parents. I worry about my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.
I can understand that. I started my own yoga studio to share my love of the practice with others. I'm a woman who worries about the judgment of my family because of my sexual orientation.
I'm glad you're able to find a way to share your love of yoga with others. It sounds like you're doing great things.
Thank you! I'm glad you're doing well too. It sounds like you're a very interesting person.
Thank you! I think you're pretty interesting too. I'm glad we met.
